dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, President Tokayev has been pretty busy, huh? Lots of bilateral meetings lately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, President Tokayev has been pretty busy, huh? Lots of bilateral meetings lately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held a number of bilateral meetings, citing the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like, super busy. He was at this Foreign Investors Council meeting, right? And apparently, he met with a bunch of key players on the sidelines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like, super busy. He was at this Foreign Investors Council meeting, right? And apparently, he met with a bunch of key players on the sidelines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the sidelines of the meeting of the Foreign Investors™ Council under the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Head of State held several meetings with event participants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. One of the big ones was Rafael Santana from Wabtec. You know, the transportation tech guys.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. One of the big ones was Rafael Santana from Wabtec. You know, the transportation tech guys.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During a conversation with Rafael Santana, President and CEO of Wabtec... The American corporation Wabtec is recognized as one of the global leaders in transportation technologies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, Wabtec! They've been, um, a reliable partner for Kazakhstan's railways for years. Like, over $230 million invested.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, Wabtec! They've been, um, a reliable partner for Kazakhstan's railways for years. Like, over two hundred thirty million dollars invested.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During a conversation with Rafael Santana, President and CEO of Wabtec, it was noted that the company has been a reliable partner of Kazakhstan™s railway sector for many years, investing more than $230 million in its development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] That's a huge amount! And Tokayev wants even more, right? Like new locomotives, more service centers, local production...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge amount! And Tokayev wants even more, right? Like new locomotives, more service centers, local production...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev emphasized that Kazakhstan expects to further its strategic cooperation in the production of a new type of locomotive, expansion of service centers, creation of a competence center, and increasing localization of production, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And then he also caught up with Marco Mariotti from Philip Morris International.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And then he also caught up with Marco Mariotti from Philip Morris International.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State also discussed investment cooperation with Marco Mariotti, President of Philip Morris International for the CIS and Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: PMI! They're, uh, apparently one of the biggest taxpayers there. Paid over 1.2 trillion tenge in taxes, like, since '94.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: P M I! They're, uh, apparently one of the biggest taxpayers there. Paid over one point two trillion tenge in taxes, like, since ninety four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company contributes to sustainable development and innovation, and is among the largest taxpayers in the country. From 1994 to 2023, Philip Morris paid over 1.2 trillion tenge in taxes to Kazakhstan's state budget.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a lot of tenge. And, um, speaking of long-term partners, he also met with David Livingstone from Citibank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a lot of tenge. And, um, speaking of long-term partners, he also met with David Livingstone from Citibank.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additionally, welcoming David Livingstone, Chief Client Officer of Citibank, Tokayev noted that the bank has been a trusted partner of Kazakhstan for over 30 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Citibank! Yeah, over 30 years they've been involved. Tokayev really wants them to keep supporting, like, big infrastructure projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Citibank! Yeah, over thirty years they've been involved. Tokayev really wants them to keep supporting, like, big infrastructure projects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additionally, welcoming David Livingstone, Chief Client Officer of Citibank, Tokayev noted that the bank has been a trusted partner of Kazakhstan for over 30 years. The President highlighted the importance of Citibank™s continued involvement in strategic infrastructure projects...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, he also mentioned their plans to help out small and medium-sized businesses, which is pretty important for diversifying the economy, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, he also mentioned their plans to help out small and medium-sized businesses, which is pretty important for diversifying the economy, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the bank™s plans to support small and medium-sized enterprises will contribute to the diversification of Kazakhstan™s real economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And then there was Gary Nagle, CEO of Glencore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And then there was Gary Nagle, C E O of Glencore.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his meeting with Gary Nagle, CEO of the Swiss company Glencore, priority areas for cooperation were discussed...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Glencore, right. The Swiss company. They're big in mining and metallurgy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Glencore, right. The Swiss company. They're big in mining and metallurgy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his meeting with Gary Nagle, CEO of the Swiss company Glencore, priority areas for cooperation were discussed, including the expansion of local content and further implementation of joint projects in the mining, metallurgy, and energy sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're a shareholder in Kazzinc. They talked about expanding local content, joint projects in energy...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're a shareholder in Kazzinc. They talked about expanding local content, joint projects in energy...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...priority areas for cooperation were discussed, including the expansion of local content and further implementation of joint projects in the mining, metallurgy, and energy sectors. Glencore is a shareholder of Kazzinc, a mining company whose enterprises are located in the East Kazakhstan, Akmola, and Ulytau regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like a pretty packed schedule, all about, um, strengthening those economic ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a pretty packed schedule, all about, um, strengthening those economic ties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And he even met with the head of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development earlier too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And he even met with the head of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development earlier too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Tokayev met with the President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, a really comprehensive push for investment and partnerships.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, a really comprehensive push for investment and partnerships.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Shows how much, uh, Kazakhstan is looking to expand its international economic footprint.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Shows how much, uh, Kazakhstan is looking to expand its international economic footprint.
